data.text: Ka lâibungngei le sarnungei, ratha mingei kôma ki misîr angin nin kôm thurchi misîr thei mu-unga; hi rammuol mi, khrista taksônna tieng nâitengei kôma misîr angin kêng nangni ki misîr pe.
Burum niloiin, runutuiin nangni ka vâi ani hi, bu nin la nêk theiloi sikin. Male atûn khom la nêk theiloi dên nin nia,3:2: Heb 5:12,13
rammuol mingei om anghan nin la om tit sikin. Nin lâia innarsana le inkhat le inkhat inkhalna aom kâr chu rammuol ta nin ni tiin minlangin aoma, anni angdêna la om nin ni tina nimak mo?
Nin lâia, “Kei chu Paul pâl ki ni,” a dangin “Kei chu Apollos pâl ki ni,” ti ngei nin la om kâr chu rammuol mingei angin nan la om bang nimak mo?3:4: 1 Kor 1:12
Apollos hah tumo ani? Paul khom tumo ani? Pathien tîrlâmngei, nin iem theina ranga sinthopu papai kêng kin ni. Pathien'n tho rang mi pêk chit kêng kin sin:
Keiman chimu ker thea, Apollos'n tui a buoka, aniatachu chimukung a minsônpu chu Pathien ani.3:6: Sin 18:4-11; Sin 18:24-28
A minsônpu Pathien ni loiin chu chimu rethepu le tui buokpu hah ite nimak ngei.
A lingpu le tui buokpu hah ite an teina om mak. An sintho lam angtakin Pathien'n râisânman pêk ngei atih.
Pathien ta ranga munkhata sintho kin nia, nangni hih Pathien loimân nin ni.
Pathien'n manboipêk ni pêk mangin in sinpu theitak angin keiman lungphûm ku phûma, midangin in an sin ani. Aniatachu mitinin an sin rang lam angtakin indîn thei rese ngei.
Pathien lungphûm a lei phûm sai Jisua Khrista pêna chu tutên lungphûm dang phûm thei noni ngei.
Ma lungphûm chunga han senkhatin rângkachakin mini, sumdârin mini, lung mantam mini mangin sin an ta; senkhatin thingin mini, sûlbuon mini, sapôl mini mangin sin an tih.
Khrista Nikhuo han meiin ânlâr rang sikin mei ngêt han mitin sintho hah phuol a ta; anina tak inlang atih.
Lungphûm chunga sin hah akâng nônchu a sinpu'n râisânman man atih.
Aniatachu tutu sintho khom akângin chu dok atih; hannirese, ama ha chu mei rakân angdôrin sanminjôkin om atih.
Pathien in nin ni le Pathien Ratha nin kôma aom ngâi ti nin riet minthâr khet mo?3:16: 1 Kor 6:19; 2 Kor 6:16
Masikin tutu khom Pathien biekin hah a sietin chu Pathien'n ama hah siet atih. Pathien biekin chu ânthieng kêng, male nangni ngei hah a biekin nin ni.
Tutên athenin inhuong no rese. Nin lâia tutu khom hi rammuol balama avârin ân bên chu a vâr tatak theina rangin amo chang bak rese.
Hi rammuolin vârna ati hih Pathien mitmûn chu achâng ani sikin, Pathien lekhabu'n, “Pathien'n mivârngei chu kin vâr an intina han a min ôk ngei ngâi,”3:19: Job 5:13 ati anghan;
male Pathien lekhabu dangin, “Pumapa'n chu mivârngei mindonna hah mangmunboi ani ti a riet,” 3:20: Lap 94:11 ati sa anghan.
Masika han tutên miriemngei song no rese ngei. Adikin chu neinun nâm nin ta ani:
Paul khom, Apollos khom, Peter khom; hi rammuol khom, ringna le thina khom, neinun omsai le ala hong om rang ngei khom anrêngin nin ta riempet an ni,
male nangni khom Khrista ta nin nia, Khrista khom Pathien ta ani.
